post:
Hello,

[NQhost ](http://nqhost.com)celebrates 5 Years anniversary today!

As sometime before, we'd like to offer a special secret promo-code from NQhost - LET66 - 66% RECURRING DISCOUNT.

You can order Linux VPS for $4.08/month or Windows VPS for $6.8/month! (NQ-1 plans.)

Can be applied to any 'normal' package - Linux VPS, Windows VPS, FreeBSD VPS.

The promo-code is limited with 30 activations.

What we offer: Bandwidth Transfer - Unmetered Transfer / Port Speed - 100Mbit shared port / vCPU(s) - 2 CPU (~2.4-3.30 Ghz) / IPv4 & IPv6 - One IPv4 address / Virtualization Type/Platform - Xen / Virtualization Control Panel - SolusVM

Payment Methods - Credit cards, PayPal, Skrill (moneybookers), WebMoney, Yandex.Money

4 Locations (test IP's):

USA, AZ - 198.15.77.202

USA, TX - 173.192.48.124

Russia - 109.68.191.1

Germany - 212.83.40.1

[Welcome onboard](http://nqhost.com)!
